meanings.definition: A group of silicate minerals containing magnesium, iron, and calcium.
meanings.sent1: The geologist found a shiny pyroxene in the rock sample.
meanings.sent2: Pyroxene is commonly found in igneous rocks.
meanings.sent3: The pyroxene in the mineral collection was the life of the party.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like pyroxene in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The pyroxene crystals gleamed like tiny jewels under the microscope.

meanings.definition: Any of a group of rock-forming silicate minerals.
meanings.sent1: Minerals like pyroxene play a key role in the formation of rocks.
meanings.sent2: The mountain was composed mainly of pyroxene and quartz.
meanings.sent3: The pyroxene in the rock formation told jokes to the other minerals.
meanings.sent4: His determination was as solid as pyroxene in the earth's crust.
meanings.sent5: The pyroxene stood out among the other minerals with its distinct color.
